com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts

Class ChartTitle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts.ChartTitle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.charts.ChartObject

    public final class ChartTitle
extends Object
implements com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.charts.ChartObject
    Represents a chart or axis title.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete()
      Deletes the title.
      ChartTitleDirection getDirection()
      Gets the title text direction.
      String getDisplayText()
      Gets the title display text.
      String getText()
      Gets the title text as direct value (for example, 'My chart title') or as a reference to a cell with value (for example, '=Sheet1!A1').
      boolean isAllowOverlap()
      Gets a value indicating whether title overlaps chart's plot area or resizes it.
      boolean isVisible()
      Gets a value indicating whether title is visible.

      Gets a value indicating whether title overlaps chart's plot area or resizes it.

      Sets the title text direction.
      void setText(String text)
      Sets the title text as direct value (for example, 'My chart title') or as a reference to a cell with value (for example, '=Sheet1!A1').

      Sets a value indicating whether title is visible.

      Returns the getDisplayText() value.

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Deletes the title.

      • getDirection

        public ChartTitleDirection getDirection()
        Gets the title text direction.
        Returns:
        The title text direction.

      • getDisplayText

        public String getDisplayText()
        Gets the title display text. If isVisible is false, then empty string is returned; otherwise, if getText() is direct value, then getText() value is returned; otherwise, if getText() is a cell reference, then referenced cell value is returned; otherwise, default title is returned.
        Returns:
        The title display text.

      • getText

        public String getText()
        Gets the title text as direct value (for example, 'My chart title') or as a reference to a cell with value (for example, '=Sheet1!A1').
        Returns:
        The title text.

      • isAllowOverlap

        public boolean isAllowOverlap()
        Gets a value indicating whether title overlaps chart's plot area or resizes it.
        Returns:
        true if title overlaps chart's plot area without resizing it; otherwise, false if title doesn't overlap chart's plot area but resizes it instead.

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Gets a value indicating whether title is visible.

        Default value of this property is false.

        If title is not visible, its properties won't be saved when saving a workbook into XLSX format.

        Returns:
        true if title is visible; otherwise, false.

      • setAllowOverlap

        public void setAllowOverlap(boolean allowOverlap)
        Gets a value indicating whether title overlaps chart's plot area or resizes it.
        Parameters:
        allowOverlap - true if title overlaps chart's plot area without resizing it; otherwise, false if title doesn't overlap chart's plot area but resizes it instead.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(ChartTitleDirection direction)
        Sets the title text direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - The title text direction.

      • setText

        public void setText(String text)
        Sets the title text as direct value (for example, 'My chart title') or as a reference to a cell with value (for example, '=Sheet1!A1'). If set value is not null nor empry string, then setVisible(boolean) is set to true.
        Parameters:
        text - The title text.

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets a value indicating whether title is visible.

        Default value of this property is false.

        If title is not visible, its properties won't be saved when saving a workbook into XLSX format.

        Parameters:
        visible - true if title is visible; otherwise, false.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the getDisplayText() value.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        The getDisplayText() value.
